title: Spotify Ad Business Boosted by Podcasts
sub_head: Strong user growth resumed in the third quarter, with the audiostreaming service reporting overall active users and paying subscribers both up 19%
body:
Spotify Technology SAâ€™s big bet on podcasts appears to be paying off.
Third-quarter advertising revenue was up 75% from a year earlier, and user growth picked up after a lull earlier this year.
